transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaskar sir.
Customer: Haan boliye, namaskar.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART se aapke pass call ja rahi hai, kaise hain?
Customer: Haan sir badhiya hai, bataiye.
Executive: Sir aap mera call pick nahi kar rahe hain sir, kuch problem hai?
Customer: Sir abhi to baat hua tha sir, to unko to main bataya ki 27 tarikh ko baat karunga to fir wo bar bar call karne lag gaya.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi uske liye uske liye main call kar bhi nahi raha hu sir, wo to aapki mam se baat ho gayi hai to fir main uske liye kyu disturb karunga. Main to aapko sirf service ke liye thoda ek question tha uske liye maine aapko contact kara sir. Haan boliye. To usi ke liye main aapse ja raha hu. Sir hum printed carpet mein deal kar rahe hain kya?
Customer: Printed designer carpet haan.
Executive: Haan kyunki sir printed carpet ke naam se hamara koi bhi product add nahi hai aur uski aapne lead kafi consume kar rakhi hai sir. Last agar month mein baat karu to saat lagbhag saat lead consume kari hui hai. To wohi main aapse ek baar confirm karne ja raha tha ki hum isme deal kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To main is product ko aapke catalog mein add kar du?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye uska image vagera main dal lunga.
Executive: Thik hai line pe rahiyega main thoda information chahiye rahegi na wo main karke fir aapko confirm kar dunga.
Customer: Haan sir mere call pick kar lijiye, main sir main aisa koi aapko koi problem chahiye to main aapko call karta nahi hu sir. Month mein mera ek contact rehta hai koi agar problem hai to bataiye maine agar koi issue aapko bataya ho.
Executive: Na na na.
Customer: Sir se call pick nahi kar rahe hain sir.
Executive: Mujhe laga ki mere end se koi galti ho gayi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi se call aaya tha na abhi haan abhi just maine kaha tha na se shuru ho raha hoga. Haan to wohi same number se baat hua tha. Unko to maine bol diya tha ki 27 tarikh ko baat karenge abhi nahi hu. Isliye call kar raha tha. Unse baat hui hai to koi aisa kuch nahi hai mam se baat hui to kyunki wo mere hi upar hai to jo mam bolengi wohi mere end par rahega. To wo koi issue nahi hai. But sir agar main aapko call karu to please utha liya kare kyunki main service ke liye hi mainly aapko call karta hu. Service mein agar kuch karna hota hai ya jankari aapko kuch provide karni hai.
Customer: Sure, sure, sure.
Executive: To main uska product ko kya mention kar du? Print printed printed carpet ke naam se mention kar du?
Customer: Haan printed designer carpet.
Executive: Printed designer carpet. Okay. Haan.
Customer: Aap sirf ye naam dal ke chhod dijiye uske baad hum sara detail main dal lunga.
Executive: Price bhi mention nahi karu price vagera aap batana chahte hain?
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch mention mat kijiye hum usme roll wise dekhna hoga roll wise karna hai ya square foot mein karna hai wo dekh ke karna padega.
Executive: Usi printed designer carpet mar ke chhod dijiye abhi dekh rahe thoda der mein laptop on karenge usme hum kar lenge.
Customer: Thik hai sir usme to hand tufted aur machine made mein bhi shayad wo hota hai alag alag correct. Polyester hai, wool hai.
Customer: Haan wo sab wo sab detail sara dekhna padega dekh ke dalna padega. False detail dal dene se fir dikkat hota hai.
Executive: Chaliye koi koi baat nahi sir maine naam karke pura mention kar diya hai thik hai. Aap ek baar go through kar lena sir. Total sir hamara sir ek product hai jisme price sari cheeze mention hai magar agar main baat karu to panch product aise hain jiske score abhi bhi low hai sir. To usme sir pata hai kya hai?
Customer: Haan wo karunga sir. Sabhi ka low tha thoda thoda karke sab mein add on karte karte sab kuch kiya hoga aur do char to product aur bacha hua hoga. Dekhta hu usme bahut sara similar type ka product hai na to kuch kuch jo hoga hata denge baad baki fir jo hoga usko. Haan jo agar aap jo abhi deal nahi ho rahi hai jispe aapki jiski aapki abhi deal nahi ho rahi hai ya fir band ho gaya hai wo product aapke end par to usko aap inactive kar dijiye aapko malum to hoga inactive kaise karna hai?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai. To jo bhi agar aapko aisa koi product nazar aata hai na to usko aap inactive mark kar dijiyega and baki sir panch product hai hamare end par jiska score low hai uspe jarurat hai aapko sirf aur sirf do cheez karne ki pehla hai specification reh raha hai aur usme reh raha hai sir minimum three images. Kyunki thousand.
Customer: Haan wo sab dekhna padega.
Executive: Haan to thousand into thousand pixel ke minimum teen image required rehte hain ye mention kar dijiyega aur specification jo hai aap wo.
Customer: Haan sab thousand rehta hai sir. Haan haan. Haan baki aapke product line mein sir jo hai wo koi issue nahi aa raha hai. Hamara sir luxury vinyl flooring hai ye to okay hai. Then auditorium carpet flooring auditorium carpet flooring another place mein hai ya nahi hai main wo ek baar unko kar leta hu.
Customer: Haan hai to.
Executive: Haan wo hai magar sir wo aapka category mapping check karwa sir. Thik hai sir baki koi issue nahi hai. Thank you sir.
Customer: Most welcome sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was receiving repeated calls.

- Wants to add printed carpet to catalog.

- Needs guidance on inactive products.

- Needs guidance on low score products.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for repeated calls.

- Executive will add printed carpet to catalog.

- Executive explained how to mark products inactive.

- Executive explained how to improve product score.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add details to printed carpet.

- Customer will update product specifications and images.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product, inactive, specification, images
